title: Shopping List
content: Create a shopping list in the variable myList. The list should be a multi-dimentional array containing several sub-arrays.
The first element in each sub-array should contain a string with the name of the item. The second element should be a number representing the quantity i.e.
There should be at least 5 sub-arrays in the list.
After the shift, ourArray would have the value ['J', 'cat']. After the unshift, ourArray would have the value ['Happy','J','cat']

exercises.instruction: Add ['Paul', 35] to the beginning of the myArray variable using unshift().

hint: The first element in each of your sub-arrays should all be strings.
The second element in each of your sub-array should all be numbers.
You should have at least 5 items in your list.
